Style/NestedParenthesizedCalls.description:
Description

Parenthesize method calls which are nested inside the argument list of another parenthesized method call.
Style/NestedParenthesizedCalls.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowedMethods: ['be', 'be_a', 'be_an', 'be_between', 'be_falsey', 'be_kind_of', 'be_instance_of', 'be_truthy', 'be_within', 'eq', 'eql', 'end_with', 'include', 'match', 'raise_error', 'respond_to', 'start_with'] (type: list)
